item.title: "Bomb cyclone" hits Midwest, takes aim at East Coast. Maps show forecast.
item.description: A powerful winter storm system moving across the Great Lakes and Northeast is bringing snow and ice, frigid temperatures and fierce wind gusts.

item.title: 12/6: The Uplift
item.description: A pint-sized politician proves you are never too little to run a big campaign. David Begnaud catches up with the Agars, a father-son duo making histor...

item.title: Dutch angry at U.S. for yanking panels honoring Black World War II troops
item.description: The removal by a U.S. military cemetery in the Netherlands of two displays recognizing Black troops who fought in World War II has spurred anger there...

item.title: Taiwan accuses China of "reckless" drills as forces simulate a blockade
item.description: As Taiwan blasts China's "highly provocative and reckless" blockade rehearsal, Trump touts his relationship with Xi Jinping and says an invasion is un...

item.title: George Clooney, his wife and their twins granted French citizenship
item.description: France's government says that George Clooney, his wife Amal and their eight-year-old twins Ella and Alexander have been awarded French citizenship.
